remarks:
Multiplication of complex numbers is associative.  Axiom 10 of 22 for real and complex numbers, justified by theorem ~ axmulass .  Proofs should normally use ~ mulass instead.  (New usage is discouraged.)  (Contributed by NM, 22-Nov-1994.) 

---

 Multiplication of complex numbers is associative.  Axiom for real and complex numbers, justified by theorem ~ axmulass .  Proofs should normally use ~ mulass instead.  (New usage is discouraged.)  (Contributed by NM, 22-Nov-1994.)
statement: ax-mulass $p |- ( ( A e. CC /\ B e. CC /\ C e. CC ) -> ( ( A x. B ) x. C ) = ( A x. ( B x. C ) ) ) $.
